QuestData.Title: The Bones of Nozronn
QuestData.Description: Bones of Nozronn, Oracle Soo-rahm sends $n to you!$B$BWe have prepared incense for you. Light it and place it near Nozronn's head and you will hear his voice.$B$B<Confused, you tell Soo-rahm that you haven't even told him your question.>$B$BTrue, we not know, but mighty Nozronn does. Do not doubt. Nozronn will answer your heart's question.$B$BGo. Nozronn not wait long.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Soo-rahm's Incense near the Bones of Nozronn, then return to Hemet Nesingwary at Nesingwary's Base Camp with the information you learned.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, have you consulted the native oracle?
QuestData.RewardText: <Hemet listens as you describe what you learned.>$B$BWay to go, $g lad:lass;. No dead rhino tells Hemet Nesingwary where and what he can hunt. We'll show that heap o' bones.
